root.name: 1941: Counter Attack
root.description: Overview1941: Counter Attack is a shoot 'em up developed and published by Capcom for the Arcade and SuperGrafx platforms.Other Appearances1941: Counter Attack is part of the Capcom Classics Collection Vol. 2 for the PlayStation 2 and Xbox platforms as well as the Capcom Classics Collection: Remixed for the PSP platform.1941: Counter Attack was also featured as one of the many emulated games that was available to play on the now unavailable Gametap service.
